onyomiExamples.meaning: place, spot, grounds, arena, stadium, range, course
outside the hall (or stadium, market, etc.), off the grounds, off the premises, off-track
opening (the doors to an event, etc.), inauguration

kunyomiExamples.meaning: place, spot, space, field, discipline, sphere, realm, occasion, situation, scene (of a play, movie, etc.), session (of the stock market), field, table, area in which cards are laid out (in a card game), round (east, south, etc.), field, field (gestalt psychology)
